gui.xaero_not_ingame: 须在游戏内才能使用编辑模式
gui.xaero_howto_drag: 左击并拖拽以移动界面
gui.xaero_howto_center: 按下C键以控制界面是否居中
gui.xaero_different_centered: 有些界面具有不同的居中外观
gui.xaero_howto_flip: 按下F键以控制是否翻转界面
gui.xaero_howto_settings: 按下S键以快速打开选中界面的设置
gui.xaero_howto_preset: 点击<选择预设>以选中一种预设方案
gui.xaero_server_disabled: 服务器可能禁用了部分模组功能
gui.xaero_box_potion_effects: 显示当前药水效果的界面
gui.xaero_box_armour_status: 显示当前盔甲状态和手持物品的界面
gui.xaero_box_sprint: 按住某单一按键(可设置)以冲锋
gui.xaero_box_sneak: 按下按键以切换潜行状态
gui.xaero_box_notifications: 屏幕上显示提醒，例如低生命/饥饿/低氧气/爆炸危险/被箭射中
gui.xaero_box_xp: 在屏幕上显示经验获取/失去的提示
gui.xaero_box_quick_use: Action-bar-like system of key bindings that lets you automatically use a specified item from your hotbar without having to switch away from your currently held item. Holding the key binding lets you keep using the item like if you were holding the right mouse button. For example: placing torches, TNT, throwing potions, eating food, drinking.
gui.xaero_box_minimap: 在小地图上显示附近环境与实体
gui.xaero_minimap_guide: 左击拖动以移动小地图
gui.xaero_toggle_map: Toggle Minimap小地图开关/切换小地图
gui.xaero_transfer_all: Transfer All Waypoints移动所有路径点
gui.xaero_clear_set_message2: 将会清除clear设置中所有路径点
gui.xaero_delete_set_message2: This set will be removed from the current world.当前设置将会从世界中移除
gui.xaero_toggle_waypoints: 切换游戏内路径点(显示)
gui.xaero_toggle_slime: Toggle Slime Chunks显示史莱姆区块
gui.xaero_toggle_grid: Toggle Chunk Grid显示区块网格
gui.xaero_compass_over_wp: Compass Over Waypoints在路径点上方显示指南针
gui.xaero_box_entity_info: 显示指向的生物实体信息，包括玩家
gui.xaero_entity_info_stay: Continue Displaying For持续显示格式
gui.xaero_entity_info_max_hearts: Max Heart Number最大红星数量
gui.xaero_entity_depth: Show Entity Depth显示实体位置深度
gui.xaero_show_full_amount: Full Held Item Quantity手持物品数量
gui.xaero_waypoint_names: 在距离上方显示路径点名称
gui.xaero_safe_mode_box: 使用基于JAVA (CPU) 的方式而不是默认的基于OpenGL (GPU) 的方式，安全模式仅用于模组无法正确运行，安全模式下并不是所有功能都能使用，非必要请勿启用。
gui.xaero_use_world_map: Use World Map Mod Chunks使用世界地图的区块
gui.xaero_waypoint_opacity_ingame: 游戏内路径点不透明度
gui.xaero_waypoint_opacity_map: 地图上路径点不透明度
gui.xaero_open_slime: Open on Key Press按下显示
gui.xaero_make_automatic: Make World/Server Auto自动生成世界
gui.xaero_make_automatic_msg2: 这将交换所选世界/服务器和自动生成(识别)的世界/服务器之间的所有路径点数据，从而自动模拟生成所选的世界/服务器。请确保明白自己在做什么
gui.xaero_make_multi_automatic: Make Sub-World Auto自动生成子世界
gui.xaero_make_multi_automatic_msg2: 这将交换所选世界/服务器和自动生成(识别)的子世界之间的所有路径点数据，从而自动模拟生成所选的子世界。请确保明白自己在做什么
gui.xaero_delete_world_msg1: 确认删除所选世界/服务器的所有路径点
gui.xaero_delete_world_msg2: 此操作无法撤销，确保明白自己在做什么
gui.xaero_delete_multi_world_msg1: 确认删除所选子世界的所有路径点
gui.xaero_delete_multi_world_msg2: 此操作无法撤销，确保明白自己在做什么
gui.xaero_multiply_msg1: 此选项仅用于修复错误的路径点坐标
gui.xaero_multiply_msg2: 确认将 §l所有§r 子世界坐标乘8
gui.xaero_divide_msg2: 确认将 §l所有§r 子世界坐标除以 8
gui.xaero_share_msg1: 确认将此路经典分享给聊天中的 §c所有人§f
gui.xaero_share_msg2: 确保不要暴露秘密位置
gui.xaero_display_all_sets: 切换所有路径点集渲染
gui.xaero_visit_needed: §e你需要先进入这一维度才能将其转换为新格式
gui.xaero_biomes_vanilla: 原版颜色模式下显示生物群系
gui.xaero_potion_effects_blink: 药水效果即将消失时闪烁
gui.xaero_waypoint_distance_visibility_a: WP Dist. Horis. Angle路径点可视角度(水平)
gui.xaero_waypoint_distance_vertical_vis: WP Dist. Vertic. Angle路径点可视角度(垂直)
gui.xaero_teleportation_tooltip: 禁用后只能通过修改配置文件来启用。
gui.xaero_use_multiworld_tooltip: 如果这是一个仅有单个世界的简单服务器(没有登陆大厅、小游戏等)，请禁用此项。在此类服务上多世界检测会出现问题，除非服务器上也安装了本模组。
gui.xaero_box_cave_maps: 洞穴模式可以显示更深的方块，主要用于显示地下洞穴和建筑物内部。天花板大小指头顶的正方形水平实心方块面积，满足设定值时才会启用洞穴模式。
gui.xaero_box_cave_maps2: 洞穴模式可以显示更深的方块，主要用于显示地下洞穴和建筑物内部。天花板大小指头顶的正方形水平实心方块面积，满足设定值时才会启用洞穴模式。实心方块与玩家不能在同一Y值上。
gui.xaero_box_distance: 指定(Specifies)，以显示游戏内路径点距离Specifies, for which in-game waypoints to show the distance to.
gui.xaero_box_distance2: 指定(Specifies)，以显示游戏内路径点距离Specifies, for which in-game waypoints to show the distance to.，不会保证同时显示多个路径点的距离，可以查看"Multiple Waypoint Distances"设置。
gui.xaero_box_always_distance: 即使非常近也显示路径点距离。此设置不会覆盖“显示路径点距离”选项
gui.xaero_box_arrow_scale: 取消小地图旋转时，玩家箭头大小
gui.xaero_box_arrow_color: 取消小地图旋转时，玩家箭头颜色
gui.xaero_box_cave_zoom: 洞穴模式下小地图缩放倍率
gui.xaero_box_entity_depth: 根据与玩家高度不同，实体显示更暗
gui.xaero_box_height_limit: 实体在小地图上消失的与玩家最大高度差
gui.xaero_box_always_entity_nametags: 忽略“实体雷达”菜单中的设置，总是显示实体名称
gui.xaero_box_teleport_default_command: 如果在路径点菜单中没有设置特定世界/特定服务器的传送命令，则会使用此命令
gui.xaero_cave_maps_depth: Cave Mode Depth洞穴模式深度
gui.xaero_teleport_coordinates_hidden: 传送失败，因为会暴露路径点坐标。禁用“隐藏路径点”选项以自由传送
gui.xaero_render_all_wp_sets: Render All Waypoint Sets渲染所有路径点集
gui.xaero_box_waypoints_distance: 本地(local)路径点最大渲染距离，全局路径点不受此影响。
gui.xaero_connect_with_auto: Add Sub-World Connection添加子世界连接
gui.xaero_disconnect_from_auto: Delete Sub-World Connection删除子世界连接
gui.xaero_world_connection_tooltip: 将选定的子世界与当前自动选择的世界连接/断开，只能与同一子服务器/世界存档的子世界连接。例如，你通过原版的下界传送门从子世界A去往子世界B，你可以安全地连接他们。其他与当前世界相连的子世界总会显示在列表的顶端，并且用星号(*)标记
gui.xaero_connect_with_auto_msg: 确认创建以下子世界间的连接
gui.xaero_disconnect_from_auto_msg: 确认删除以下子世界间的连接
gui.xaero_teleport_not_connected: 正在尝试传送至未与当前自动选择的世界相连的子世界，如果确定这两个世界是在同一子服务器/世界存档中，可以通过在路径点菜单中 -> 选项 -> 添加子世界连接来启用传送。但应当注意的是，如果连接了无关的两个子世界并尝试传送，有可能会卡在方块中窒息，或是从高处坠落，因此应当小心并只连接正确的子世界
gui.xaero_box_ignore_heightmaps: 一些服务器在世界高度中设定了自定义值，这可能会导致地图渲染不正确。这有时也会发生在有大量模组的单人世界中。这一选项可以修复这类错误，但是会牺牲一部分性能。因此，非必须请勿启用此选项。切换此选项后请重新进入世界。
gui.xaero_error_loading_properties: 加载服务器小地图属性时出错，请重试。
gui.xaero_box_waypoints_bottom: 将新创建的路径点置于列表底部，而不是默认的顶部
gui.xaero_box_entity_radar_names:
在实体点或图标/头像下方渲染实体名称 
 
 选项“伴随玩家列表” - 仅在按下“玩家列表”键(默认为TAB)时显示名称。
gui.xaero_light_overlay_status: Using Light Overlay正使用光照覆盖
gui.xaero_box_light_overlay_type: 由于尚未使用World Map模组的区块，并且会增加小地图的刷新频率，启用光照覆盖会影响游戏性能。因此不要一直开启此功能。
gui.xaero_box_entity_radar_icons:
渲染实体图标而不是有颜色的点 
 
 选项 “伴随玩家列表” - 仅在按下“玩家列表”键(默认为TAB)时显示图标。
gui.xaero_box_minimap_size:
设定小地图的尺寸。当方形小地图尺寸大于180时，其会锁定为不旋转的模式(选项“小地图锁定北向”) 
 
 划至最左侧以使用“自动”设定。 
 
 旧版本尺寸对应值 
  极小 - 57 
 小 - 85 
 中 - 113 
 大 - 169
gui.xaero_box_waypoints_clamp_depth:
当超过此深度时，若与路径点距离变远，游戏内路径点的显示不会变得更小。 
 如果想改变极远处的路径点大小，可以调节此选项。 Use the "Waypoint In-Game Scale" setting to also affect the size of waypoints when you are close to them. 
 
 For the "Auto" option, go all the way to the left. 
 The automatic option attempts to give you the best value for the default values of scale types, taking your FOV and screen height into account. 
 
 Default values in older mod versions: 
 Clamp Depth: 12 
 In-Game Scale: 2.5 
 Name Text Scale: 0.5 
 Distance Text Scale: 0.8
gui.xaero_box_waypoints_distance_scale:
Scale of the text displaying the distance to an in-game waypoint. 
 
 Default values in older mod versions: 
 Clamp Depth: 12 
 In-Game Scale: 2.5 
 Name Text Scale: 0.5 
 Distance Text Scale: 0.8
gui.xaero_box_waypoints_name_scale:
Scale of the text displaying the name of an in-game waypoint. 
 
 Default values in older mod versions: 
 Clamp Depth: 12 
 In-Game Scale: 2.5 
 Name Text Scale: 0.5 
 Distance Text Scale: 0.8
gui.xaero_box_waypoints_scale:
Scale of in-game waypoints. Use this to change the scale of all in-game waypoints, including those that are near you. Use the "Clamp Depth" setting to specifically affect the size of waypoints that are far away. 
 
 Default values in older mod versions: 
 Clamp Depth: 12 
 In-Game Scale: 2.5 
 Name Text Scale: 0.5 
 Distance Text Scale: 0.8
gui.xaero_uses_worldmap_value: Setting value is taken from the world map settings!
gui.xaero_box_ui_scale: Scale of text and other minimap UI elements. Not made for zooming in or resizing. There are separate options for that.
gui.xaero_box_pushbox_boss_health:
An invisible box around the vanilla boss health display that pushes the mod's interfaces out of the way. 
 
 Normal type's collision box is equal to its size and only pushes interfaces by the necessary distance. 
 
 Screen Height type's collision box is stretched across the whole screen height and always shifts colliding interfaces vertically by the Normal type's height. This can be very useful when you have multiple interfaces in a column and want all of them to be pushed.
gui.xaero_box_pushbox_potion_effects:
An invisible box around the vanilla potion effects display that pushes the mod's interfaces out of the way. 
 
 Normal type's collision box is equal to its size and only pushes interfaces by the necessary distance. 
 
 Screen Height type's collision box is stretched across the whole screen height and always shifts colliding interfaces vertically by the Normal type's height. This can be very useful when you have multiple interfaces in a column and want all of them to be pushed.
gui.xaero_box_minimap_frame_color: The color of the minimap frame for the non-default colored frame styles.
gui.xaero_box_compass_scale: The scale of the compass letters NESW when using the on-map compass location.
gui.xaero_box_compass_over_wp2: Render compass letters (N, E, S, W) over the on-map waypoints. This only works for the on-frame compass location.
gui.xaero_teleport_y_unknown: You can't teleport to a waypoint that doesn't specify the Y coordinate. Edit the waypoint to be able to teleport to it.
gui.xaero_box_waypoints_distance_scale2: Scale of the text displaying the distance to an in-game waypoint.
gui.xaero_box_waypoints_name_scale2: Scale of the text displaying the name of an in-game waypoint.
gui.xaero_box_ingame_waypoint_icon_scale: Scale of the in-game waypoint icons.
gui.xaero_box_ingame_waypoint_close_scal: Scale of the in-game waypoints when you are very close to them. To change the scale of waypoints that are far away, use the "In-Game Waypoint Icon Scale", "Waypoint Distance Text Scale" and "Waypoint Name Text Scale" settings.
gui.xaero_settings_not_found: No matching entries found for your input!
gui.xaero_multiple_waypoint_info: Multiple Waypoint Distances多路径点距离显示
gui.xaero_box_multiple_waypoint_info: Whether the distance can be displayed for multiple in-game waypoints at once. By default, only the distance to the closest waypoint to the crosshair is displayed. Use the "Distance to WP" setting to configure which waypoints the distance could even be shown for.
gui.xaero_entity_category_same_team: From the Same Team来自同一团队
gui.xaero_entity_category_other_teams: From Other Teams来自其他团队
gui.xaero_box_category_include_list: A list of entity types to include on top of the entities included by the "Hard Include".
gui.xaero_box_category_exclude_list: A list of entity types to exclude from the already included entity types. Can work both as a "whitelist" and a "blacklist" depending on the exclusion mode you choose.
gui.xaero_box_category_hard_include: Controls which entities to automatically include without having to put them in the include list manually.
gui.xaero_category_disable_protection_co: Disable protection for the following category?
gui.xaero_category_enable_protection_con: Enable protection for the following category?
gui.xaero_box_category_protection: Category protection prevents you from (accidentally) deleting, moving, renaming a category or changing its "Hard Include" setting.
gui.xaero_category_settings_reset_confir: Reset the category configuration to default values?
Custom categories will be removed and the default ones will be reset.
gui.xaero_box_radar_render_order: Controls the order in which the radar categories are rendered. A lower number means being rendered earlier. However, in the newer Minecraft versions dots are always rendered on top of the icons. The order still applies within dot or icon rendering though.
gui.xaero_box_always_entity_nametags2: Always render names for entities with name tags regardless of what the name setting is set to.
narration.xaero_ui_list_left_right_usage: Press LEFT and RIGHT buttons to select a column within the entry.
gui.xaero_category_help: Sub-categories that are higher on the list are prioritized when multiple sub-categories include the same entity! Keep that in mind when creating custom categories. Usually, a new custom category should be placed at the top.
